name: A Dead Tree - A Casual Virtual Pet Game
name_original: A Dead Tree - A Casual Virtual Pet Game
description:
A Dead Tree is a casual virtual pet game inspired by Ikebana (Asian flower arrangement) and the L-System algorithm, introduced in The Algorithmic Beauty of Plants. 

Similar to virtual pets, a dead tree will grow slowly at the top of the screen according to the constantly iterative and updated growth rule library. Players can use their mouse to interact with it to enjoy the beauty of plants and relax. Every time the tree player plants is unique. A tree grows according to the constantly iterative and updated growth rule library with controlled random variables.
